Text.Value: Ngh... it hurts...

Text.Value: What else do you know about the temple? Any other treasure?
It was nothing. Put it out of your mind.

Synopsis:
Conversation with an adventurer who has been tortured. The player may or may not have participated in the torture. The adventurer is hurt, tired, and broken.
Note for mocap recording: the tortured adventurer can say most of his lines chained on a bed or free (standing up). Please record everything standing up. Cinematics will handle the lying down state.
